_header: Upon a lady fair and bright
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: A song of the Virgin Mary — four five-line stanzas (ababc) including refrain, ‘Newell’ or ‘Nowell’ plus burden (cc): ‘Newell newell newell newell / I thank a maydyn euery dele’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Vpon a lady fayre & brightSo hartely I haue set my
                    thowght…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& to Mary I mak my monefor on her I thynk & say right
                    nowghtNowellExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
